gang.name: Untouched
gang.description: Attacker's will be cursed and suffer reduced damage for the turn.

gang.name: Counter Attack
gang.description: When attacked, there is a chance to immediately counterattack all enemies around.

gang.name: Meat Armor
gang.description: Gives bonus HP and damage on every kill and reduces elements damage.

gang.name: Weapons are the best
gang.description: When victorius, the loot will be only weapon, no drug and no alcohol.

gang.name: Mortal Strike
gang.description: Will have a chance of inflicting critical damage bonus.

gang.name: Bouncerize
gang.description: Grant bonus damage to all your bouncers.

gang.name: Kamikaze
gang.description: Grant bonus damage to all your hobos.

gang.name: Sword Master
gang.description: Grant bonus damage to all your knifers.

gang.name: Negotiator
gang.description: Double the bonus of the lawyers.

mafia.name: Vengeance Aura
mafia.description: An aura that increases the attack damage of nearby friendly units. If Venge dies, damage bonus will double.

mafia.name: Vampiric Aura
mafia.description: Grants attack lifesteal. Every attack will heal by a percentage of the damage.

mafia.name: Master of fire
mafia.description: All your units make +20 fire damage.

mafia.name: Alcohol is the best
mafia.description: When victorius, the loot will be only alcohol, no drug and no weapon.

mafia.name: Hooligan Blood
mafia.description: Grant bonus damage to all your rowdies.

mafia.name: Hit & Run
mafia.description: Grant bonus speed to all your gunmans.

mafia.name: Eye of the Eagle
mafia.description: Grant bonus damage to all your snipers.

mafia.name: Drunken Master
mafia.description: Double the bonus of the ninjas.

cartel.name: Faulty Vest
cartel.description: Enemies mercenaries can't user their bulletproofs.

cartel.name: Demoralize
cartel.description: Reduce the offensive power of your enemy by 2%.

cartel.name: Reincarnation
cartel.description: Will come back on next player turn after being killed slowing enemies around.

cartel.name: Drugs are the best
cartel.description: When victorius, the loot will be only drygs, no alcohol and no weapons.

cartel.name: Mama Lova
cartel.description: Grant bonus damage to all your big mamas.

cartel.name: Commander
cartel.description: Grant bonus damage to all your mercenaries.
